item.title: 网络威胁扰乱美国、英国和欧洲的全球企业
item.description: 全球企业都在努力应对网络和勒索软件攻击的激增，从医疗保健和金融服务到零售和监管机构，各行各业都面临着日益复杂的威胁，它们的运营受到破坏，敏感数据被泄露。【原文：Global companies are grappling with a surge in cyber and ransomware attacks, with increasingly sophisticated threat actors disrupting operations and compromising sensitive data across diverse sectors—from healthcare and financial services to retail and regulatory bodies.】

item.title: Downdetector 显示，加拿大贝尔电信公司数万用户服务中断
item.description: 据停电跟踪网站 Downdetector.com 称，加拿大电信公司 BCE 旗下的 Bell 周三为该国数万用户提供了服务。【原文：Canadian telecom firm BCE's Bell was down for tens of thousands of users in the country on Wednesday, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 随着质量和安全文化的改善，波音提高了 737 的生产速度
item.description: 波音公司商用飞机质量副总裁道格-阿克曼（Doug Ackerman）周二告诉记者，波音公司预计在未来几个月内将737 MAX的月产量稳定在38架。【原文：Boeing expects to stabilize 737 MAX production at 38 airplanes a month over the next couple of months, its Commercial Airplanes Vice President of Quality Doug Ackerman told reporters on Tuesday.】

item.title: Shopify 推出人工智能工具，可根据关键词创建完整的在线商店
item.description: Shopify 周三推出了一项人工智能生成功能，允许其电子商务平台上的商家通过输入描述性关键字来开设网店。【原文：Shopify , on Wednesday rolled out a generative artificial intelligence feature that would allow merchants on its e-commerce platform to set up their online stores by entering descriptive keywords.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，摩托罗拉解决方案公司接近以 45 亿美元交易 Silvus
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道，摩托罗拉解决方案公司正在就以大约 45 亿美元的价格收购持股比例较低的无线射频制造商 Silvus Technologies 公司进行深入谈判。【原文：Motorola Solutions is in advanced talks to acquire closely held wireless-radio maker Silvus Technologies for around $4.5 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国加征关税，欧盟瞄准商业壁垒提升竞争力
item.description: 欧盟委员会周三制定了消除欧盟内部商业壁垒的计划，以此推动提高竞争力并抵消美国关税的影响。【原文：The European Commission set out plans on Wednesday to remove barriers to business within the European Union as part of a push to boost competitiveness and counteract the impact of U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 尽管与中国达成了短暂的贸易休战协议，但美国经济前景依然疲软
item.description: 路透社对经济学家进行的一项调查显示，尽管中美贸易战暂时降温，但美国经济前景依然疲弱，有关美国财政健康状况的争论悬而未决。【原文：The outlook for the U.S. economy remains weak despite a temporary cooling of the U.S.-China trade war, a Reuters poll of economists showed, with a debate over the country's fiscal health hanging in the balance.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪四月售出 213,325 辆配备智能辅助驾驶功能的汽车
item.description: 中国电动汽车巨头比亚迪周三表示，4月份销售了213,325辆具有智能辅助驾驶功能的汽车，占截至4月底此类汽车总销量的近一半。【原文：China's electric vehicle giant BYD said on Wednesday it sold 213,325 vehicles with smart assisted driving features in April, accounting for almost half of its total sales of such vehicles as of end-April.】

item.title: 航空公司首席执行官称美国空中交通管制系统 "令美国人失望"，呼吁采取行动
item.description: 各大航空公司首席执行官周三呼吁美国国会批准数十亿美元，对老化的美国空中交通管制系统进行现代化改造，称目前的系统 "辜负了美国人的期望"。【原文：Major airline CEOs on Wednesday called on Congress to approve billions of dollars to modernize the aging U.S. air traffic control system, saying the current system is "failing Americans."】

item.title: 中国称美国贸易谈判很重要，但多边主义是解决问题的关键
item.description: 中国周三表示，与美国的贸易谈判是弥合分歧的重要一步，但真正需要的是 "不可或缺的 "多边主义，以找到走出全球贸易动荡的途径。【原文：China said on Wednesday trade talks with the U.S. were an important step toward bridging gaps but what was really needed was "indispensable" multilateralism to find a way out of global trade turmoil.】

item.title: M&S 称网络黑客通过第三方承包商入侵
item.description: 马莎百货公司称，黑客通过欺骗第三方承包商的员工，绕过其数字防御系统，侵入了其系统，发动了网络攻击，这将使这家英国零售商的业务中断数月之久。【原文：Marks & Spencer said hackers broke into its systems by tricking employees at a third-party contractor, skirting its digital defences to launch a cyberattack that will disrupt the British retailer for months.】

item.title: Stellantis 将在底特律建造价值 3.88 亿美元的备件工厂
item.description: 法意集团 Stellantis 周三表示，将投资 3.88 亿美元在美国底特律市为其 Mopar 零部件业务建立一个新中心。【原文：Stellantis will invest $388 million to build a new hub in the U.S. city of Detroit for its Mopar components operations, the Franco-Italian group said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 费罗维亚高速公路收入因关税前美国交通量而增长
item.description: 高速公路和机场运营商费罗维亚公司首席财务官告诉路透社，美国和加拿大收费公路的货运量带来了第一季度意外的收入增长，这可能与预计美国将全面征收关税的进口有关。【原文：Motorway and airports operator Ferrovial had a surprise first-quarter revenue bump from freight traffic on toll roads in the United States and Canada, probably related to imports in anticipation of sweeping U.S. tariffs, its CFO told Reuters.】

item.title: 失望的保时捷投资者呼吁首席执行官布卢姆放弃保时捷与大众的双重身份
item.description: 保时捷首席执行官奥利弗-布卢姆（Oliver Blume）同时也是母公司大众汽车（Volkswagen）的负责人，由于中国市场的疲软和美国与关税相关的挑战迫使这家跑车制造商下调了前景展望，投资者周三呼吁他放弃其中一个职务。【原文：Investors called upon Porsche CEO Oliver Blume, who also heads parent company Volkswagen, to drop one of his roles on Wednesday as weakness in China and tariff-related challenges in the United States have forced the sportscar maker to cut its outlook.】

item.title: 关税不确定性影响需求，VF 公司季度收入不及预期
item.description: 由于严峻的宏观经济环境抑制了消费者需求，服装和鞋类制造商 VF 公司周三未能达到第四季度收入预期，导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌约 11%。【原文：Apparel and footwear maker VF Corp on Wednesday missed fourth-quarter revenue estimates as a challenging macroeconomic environment dampened its consumer demand, sending its shares down about 11% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 仅有 8%的意大利企业使用人工智能，许多人缺乏数字知识
item.description: 意大利国家统计局（ISTAT）周三公布的数据显示，在长期受经济增长缓慢拖累的意大利，与欧盟其他国家相比，使用人工智能的公司数量有限。【原文：In Italy, long burdened by slow economic growth, the number of companies using artificial intelligence is limited compared to other European Union countries, according to figures released on Wednesday by national statistics bureau ISTAT.】

item.title: 非价格零售商 TJX 维持年度预测不变，但销售额超出预期
item.description: TJX Cos 公司周三维持了年度预期，第一季度销售额超出华尔街预期，因为在经济不确定性日益增加的情况下，寻求优惠以节省开支的购物者涌向这家非价格零售商的商店。【原文：TJX Cos maintained annual forecasts and beat Wall Street expectations for first-quarter sales on Wednesday, as shoppers looking for deals to save money in the face of growing economic uncertainties flocked to the stores of the off-price retailer.】

item.title: 联合健康（UnitedHealth）被报道暗中付钱给养老院以减少转院次数后业绩下滑
item.description: 联合健康（UnitedHealth）股价周三在盘前交易中下跌近 7%，此前英国《卫报》报道称，该医疗保健集团秘密向养老院支付数千美元奖金，以帮助减少患病居民的转院次数。【原文：UnitedHealth shares fell nearly 7% on Wednesday in premarket trading after a Guardian report that the healthcare conglomerate secretly paid nursing homes thousands in bonuses to help slash hospital transfers for ailing residents.】

item.title: 香港通过稳定币法案，离发行稳定币更近一步
item.description: 香港立法机构周三通过了一项稳定币法案，为香港的法币参考稳定币发行商建立了一个发牌制度，为即将到来的稳定币发行商提供了清晰的监管。【原文：Hong Kong's legislature passed a stablecoin bill on Wednesday that establishes a licensing regime for fiat-referenced stablecoin issuers in Hong Kong, providing regulatory clarity for upcoming stablecoin issuers.】

item.title: 阿联酋推出阿拉伯语人工智能模型，海湾竞赛步伐加快
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国周三推出了一种新的阿拉伯语人工智能（AI）模型，海湾地区开发人工智能技术的竞赛正在加速。【原文：The United Arab Emirates launched a new Arabic language artificial intelligence (AI) model on Wednesday as the regional race to develop AI technologies accelerates in the Gulf.】

item.title: 电动汽车交付量强劲，新鹏汽车预计季度收入增长
item.description: 中国新鹏汽车周三预计第二季度营收将高于华尔街预期，押注于对其低价电动汽车日益增长的需求。【原文：China's XPeng on Wednesday forecast second-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates, betting on growing demand for its lower-priced electric vehicles.】

item.title: 印尼反垄断机构正在调查 Grab-GoTo 合并案的风险
item.description: 印度尼西亚反垄断机构负责人周三表示，该机构已开始进行研究，旨在确定科技巨头Grab和GoTo可能合并带来的风险。【原文：Indonesia's antitrust agency has started research aimed at identifying risks from a possible merger between tech giants Grab and GoTo , its head said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪在欧洲推出 "海豚冲浪 "电动车，掀起热潮
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪的低成本车型 "海豚冲浪"（Dolphin Surf）本周三成为其在欧洲推出的第10款车型。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD's low-cost Dolphin Surf became its 10th model available in Europe on Wednesday, with the Berlin launch increasing pressure on European rivals to produce more affordable alternatives.】

item.title: 早间竞价债券的糟糕一周
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 关税压力增大，需求进一步放缓，目标下调年度预测
item.description: 塔吉特在公布季度同店销售大幅下滑后，于周三下调了全年销售预期，并将下滑归因于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）咄咄逼人的贸易政策导致的消费者信心减弱和可自由支配支出的回落。【原文：Target slashed its annual sales forecast on Wednesday after posting a sharp decline in quarterly same-store sales, attributing the declines to weakened consumer confidence and a pullback in discretionary spending due to U.S. President Donald Trump's aggressive approach to trade.】

item.title: 环球新史诗宇宙乐园在佛罗里达挑战迪士尼
item.description: 几十年来，奥兰多环球度假区一直是度假者前往 "地球上最神奇的地方 "迪斯尼世界的中转站。【原文：For decades, Universal Orlando Resort was a pit stop on a vacationer’s way to the “Most Magical Place on Earth,” Walt Disney World.】

item.title: 金融科技公司 Airwallex 在最新一轮融资中估值超过 60 亿美元
item.description: 支付公司 Airwallex 周三表示，该公司在最近一次 3 亿美元的融资中估值达 62 亿美元。【原文：Payments firm Airwallex said on Wednesday it was valued at $6.2 billion in its latest fundraise of $300 million.】

item.title: 劳氏公司（Lowe's）报告销售额降幅小于预期，原因是需求稳定
item.description: 家居装饰零售商劳氏公司（Lowe's Cos）周三公布的第一季度可比销售额降幅小于预期，原因是在借贷成本上升的情况下，购物者在维修项目上花费了大量资金，而在大件商品上则暂缓购买。【原文：Home improvement retailer Lowe's Cos posted a smaller-than-expected drop in first-quarter comparable sales on Wednesday, as shoppers spent on maintenance projects while holding off on big-ticket purchases amid higher borrowing costs.】

item.title: 加拿大银行为贸易不确定性做好准备，第二季度贷款损失准备金增加
item.description: 预计加拿大的大银行在第二季度将加强贷款损失准备金，六大银行中有四家将拨出超过 10 亿加元的准备金，以应对贸易不稳定时期可能出现的贷款违约。【原文：Canada's big banks are expected to have shored up loan loss reserves in the second quarter, with four of the big six banks putting aside over C$1 billion to shield against potential loan defaults in a time of trade uncertainty.】

item.title: 消息人士称中国移动更接近收购香港宽带公司 HKBN
item.description: 三位消息人士称，在竞争对手 I Squared Capital 退出竞购后，全球用户量最大的无线运营商中国移动正接近达成收购香港宽带公司 HKBN 的交易。【原文：China Mobile , the world's biggest wireless carrier by users, is moving closer to a deal to take over Hong Kong broadband company HKBN after rival bidder I Squared Capital dropped out of the race, three sources said.】
